summary: This is an email from Bobbi Sternheim, an attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, providing a courtesy copy of an ECF filing to the defense team in the case U.S. v. Maxwell. The filing appears to be a letter regarding deprivation issues.

events.title: ECF Filing in Maxwell Case
events.description: An ECF filing, described as a letter regarding deprivation issues, is submitted in the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email from attorney Bobbi Sternheim dated April 29, 2021.
The email transmits a courtesy copy of an ECF filing related to the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330).
The filing is a letter concerning 'deprivation' issues, as indicated by the attachment name 'Letter_re-fileep_Deprivation-4-29-21.pdf'.
The email is sent to the defense team, including Christian Everdell, Laura Mennin, and Jeff Pagliuca.
The correspondence shows ongoing legal activity in Ghislaine Maxwell's case in late April 2021.
